image:image.image:title: The Object Without Attachment
image:image.image:caption: Humans are wired to bond with things we work through, not just finish. When AI compresses effort, you get the result without the emotional imprint that normally makes it feel yours.

image:image.image:title: If everyone is losing jobs, who pays for AI infrastructure?
image:image.image:caption: If everyone is losing jobs, who pays for AI infrastructure? It is funded by concentrated capital and by customers, and the risk is who gets left out.

image:image.image:title: Accelerando and the future of L&D
image:image.image:caption: When AI is embedded in workflows, performance support is dead and L&D shifts to shaping how work gets done.

image:image.image:title: AI Hype vs Adoption
image:image.image:caption: Everything around AI is overhyped for retention. But how much is actually getting adopted into daily workflows?

image:image.image:title: The Art vs Craft of Building with Code
image:image.image:caption: Tools make implementation easier, but they don't solve the harder problem of designing systems that actually work.

image:image.image:title: Publishing Without the WordPress Headache
image:image.image:caption: I keep coming back to a simple question: can I get my ideas onto my website without the WordPress circus?
